Tool

NameLine Dissolve
ID5
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2011

Description

Dissolves line shapes, which share the same attribute value(s).

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Lines Shapes (input)LINES
Output
Dissolved LinesShapes (output)DISSOLVED
Options
1. AttributeTable fieldFIELD_1
2. AttributeTable fieldFIELD_2
3. AttributeTable fieldFIELD_3
Dissolve...ChoiceALLAvailable Choices: [0] lines with same attribute value(s) [1] all lines Default: 0
